text_block_list.text:
The final day of the summer training
camp…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
How was that, Trainer?! 
Wasn't it brilliantly fast!?
choice_data_list: That speed in the sand is amazing!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I think I've improved quite a bit at 
this training camp!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
She was fast to begin with, but now
she's even faster! Truly a Bakushin-
worthy speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is as good as a promise! 
Victory in the Sprinter's Stakes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If I don't win by a landslide, I'll 
change my name to Sakura O!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course I will! 
That's the only way to win!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Please look forward to it, 
as a sort of spectator!

…This is how the, hot? summer training 
camp with Sakura Bakushin O came 
to an end.
